EmailTemplate.name: Global_Product_Webinar_Unstructured Data Session 1.Reminder 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Pivotal's Unstructured Data - Video Analytics on Hadoop Webinar begins at 9AM
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Unstructured Data - Video Analytics on Hadoop A Friendly Reminder of Your Registration.
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, We are looking forward to you joining us this morning for our second installment in the "What You Can Do With Hadoop" webinar series.
Event Details:
Date: Thursday, September 5, 2013
Time: 9AM PST/ 5PM GMT Summer Time
Join the Webex <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=667566950>
Event Number: 667 566 950
Dial In:
- US TOLL FREE: +1-855-749-4750 - US TOLL: +1-415-655-0001 - Global call-in numbers <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/globalcallin.php?serviceType=EC&ED=107432872&tollFree=1> - Toll-free dialing restrictions <http://www.webex.com/pdf/tollfree_restrictions.pdf> - Access code: 667 566 950
Have questions? Contact us <mailto:marketing@gopivotal.com>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team Stay current on all things Pivotal Visit our blog >> <http://blog.gopivotal.com/> Pivotal HD Community Forum Join Now >> <http://www.gopivotal.com/community/pivotal-hd>
